title: Important Updates
description: The California Board of Chiropractic Examiners mission is to protect Californians from fraudulent or incompetent practice of chiropractic, examine applicants for licensure in order to evaluate entry level competence, and enforce the Chiropractic Initiative Act and regulations relating to the practice of chiropractic.
cleaned_text: The Mission of the Board of Chiropractic Examiners The mission of the Board of Chiropractic Examiners is to protect the health, welfare, and safety of the public through licensure, education, and enforcement in chiropractic care. Important Updates - NEW [01/01/2023: New BCE Fee Schedule Effective January 1, 2023](/forms_pubs/fee_schedule_2023.pdf) - NEW [1/11/2022: Waiver Information for Continuing Education Requirements: All Licensees](/licensees/waivers_info_ce_all.shtml) - NEW [12/14/2021: EDD Disability Insurance Scam FAQs](https://www.edd.ca.gov/about_edd/fraud.htm#scamFAQ) - NEW [12/1/21: BCE's Office Has Moved](/about_us/office_moved.shtml) - NEW [11/30/2021: BCE Executive Officer Recruitment Announcement](/about_us/eo_recruitment.shtml) [8/31/2021: Waiver DCA-21-185 Chiropractic School Schedule and Class Length Waiver Extension](/licensees/waivers_info_chiro_schools.shtml) [8/17/2021: Health Care Workers and Vaccination Requirements](/licensees/vaccination_reqs.shtml) [8/9/2021: CDPH Q&A Guidance on Health Care Worker Protections in High-Risk Settings State Public Health Order](https://www.cdph.ca.gov/Programs/CID/DCDC/Pages/COVID-19/Unvaccinated-Workers-in-High-Risk-Settings-State-Public-Health-Order-FAQ.aspx) [Expedited Licensure for Refugees, Asylees, and Holders of Special Immigrant Visas](/applicants/ab2113.shtml) [Order Waiving Restrictions On Chiropractic School Schedules And Class Lengths](/applicants/waiver_school_schedule.shtml) [Waiver for Applicants](/applicants/waivers.shtml) [A Call to Action for the COVID-19 Response: How to Restore Your Inactive, Forfeited, or Canceled Chiropractic License to Active Status.](/about_us/covid_restore.shtml) [COVID-19 - Licensee Request for License Restoration Back to Active](/about_us/back_to_active.shtml) - [Guidance Relating to Non-Discrimination in Medical Treatment for Novel Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19)](https://www.dhcs.ca.gov/Documents/COVID-19/Joint-Bullletin-Medical-Treatment-for-COVID-19-033020.pdf) [BCE Statement on COVID-19 (Coronavirus)](/about_us/covid19_statement.shtml) [Have Click Here.](https://www.dca.ca.gov/consumers/coronavirus.shtml) REPORT](publications/2017_fee_audit.pdf) Military Personnel and Their Spouses/Domestic Partners](https://www.dca.ca.gov/military/) [Board of Chiropractic Examiners Adopts New Regulations for the Use of Lasers in Chiropractic](about_us/business/20120619_laser.shtml) [Alert - Potential License Denial or Suspension for Failure to Pay Taxes](https://www.dca.ca.gov/ab1424.shtml) [Notice Regarding New Informed Consent Requirements](laws_regs/informed_consent.shtml) "The vertebrae of the spine are likely to be displaced or subluxated. One of more vertebrae may get out of place very much. This may cause serious complications, and even death, if not properly adjusted. Whoever pays no attention, or paying attention, does not comprehend them, how can he understand the disease which befalls man? The doctor should look well to the spine, for many diseases have their origin in vertebral displacements." ~Hippocrates YOU MAY STILL HAVE NONRESIDENT WITHHOLDING RESPONSIBILITIES FRANCHISE TAX BOARD NONRESIDENT WITHHOLDING REQUIREMENTS If you pay California source income to nonresidents of California, the California Franchise Tax Board (FTB) wants to make you aware that unless certain exceptions apply, you must withhold and send to FTB seven percent of all payments that exceed $1,500 in a calendar year. (California Revenue and Taxation Code Section 18662). For more information on whether or not you are required by law to withhold or to get the appropriate forms to use, click the link below. [DECISION CHART](https://www.ftb.ca.gov/file/personal/residency-status/part-year-and-nonresident.html#Do-I-need-to-file-) For a copy of the necessary forms visit the Forms and Publication page by clicking the link. [FORMS & PUBLICATIONS](https://www.ftb.ca.gov/forms/index.html) For more general information on withholding requirements, visit the Withholding on California Source Income by clicking the link or contact us at (888) 792-4900. [CALIFORNIA WITHHOLDING](https://www.ftb.ca.gov/pay/withholding/index.html) Quick
